data.oai_dc:dc: Occurrence|Specimen|Herbarium, plantae, Vanuatu, vascular plants, occurrence, New Hebrides

This dataset contains all the occurences data of this national database. Since the 1970's, Vanuatu managed a national herbarium. All the plants collection made in the country have to be stored in this herbarium. In 2012, the specimens have been registered in a local database, except the fungi and mosses collection.|17,920 occurrences
